title: Happy Birthday, Umi-chan!
detail_text: <:th_ch0201/>Happy birthday, Umi-chan! We’re done setting up the party. Let’s go to the clubroom! Honoka-chan and Kotori-chan led the whole thing. They said they’re doing it just for you, so look forward to it~!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0004/>Thank you, Ayumu. But.... I can’t help but be worried. If Honoka was that excited, she might be planning some kind of surprise....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0201/>Eh, uh, umm.... Maybe?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0004/>Ayumu, your eyes are going everywhere.... Okay, I’ll prepare myself for it.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0201/>Eeeh!? You’re wrong, uhh.... Well, you’re not exactly wrong, but you are....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0004/>Fufu, please don’t worry about it. I understand both of them very well. It’s fun to think of it as another part of the birthday ritual.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0201/>Uuu, it would’ve been better if you didn’t know, right? I’m sorry I took all the fun out of it.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0004/>What are you saying? I look forward to it even more now! I’ll be doing my best to reverse the surprise, after all! Please lend me your strength, Ayumu.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0201/>O-, okay. I’ll support you, Umi-chan!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0004/>Thank you. Then, let us go! Just you wait, Honoka, Kotori!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
